downloadTitle: Microsoft® SQL Server® 2014 Integration Services Attunity Oracle CDC Designer/Service Feature Pack
downloadDescription: The Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Integration Services Attunity Oracle CDC Designer/Service Feature Pack is a stand-alone package which provide additional value for SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS).
detailsSection:
The Microsoft SQL Server 2014 Integration Services Attunity Oracle CDC Designer/Service Feature Pack is a stand-alone package which provide additional value for SQL Server Integration Services (SSIS). It includes the latest versions of:
  • Attunity Oracle CDC Designer.
  • Attunity Oracle CDC Service.

This Feature Pack includes Attunity Oracle CDC Designer/Service 2.0.0.114.
The following enhancements were made:
  • Bug Fixes – Property is removed automatically when the user adds Oracle table or removes Oracle table in the Advanced options in Oracle CDC Designer.
  • Bug Fixes – Change Data Capture stops working after a recent cumulative update for SQL Server is installed. See KB4038210 for details
  • Improvement – Improved support for RAC, this includes better handling when a RAC node is restarted.
  • Bug Fixes – The CDC is not working with Oracle 10.2 due to requesting NEXT_CHANGE# from the v$log.
installInstructionSection: After the download has completed, execute the download package on the system where the SQL Server components to be updated are installed and follow the instructions
